item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0591; 09:58AM; 6215 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PzXiQf; #NorthHollywood; PRELIM: Smoke showing from a vacant 100' x 50' one-story commercial building ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E239 E260 E278 E298 E76 E77 E89 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T78 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

ADVISORY - USC Training Exercise; 09:30AM; University of Southern California; #USC; ADVISORY: Today (December 15, 2022) between 10 AM and 3 PM, LAFD and allied agencies will be conducting Active Shooter/Hostile Event TRAINING on the USC Campus. Today's TRAINING DRILL may include weapon sounds and simulated public safety radio communications. THIS IS ONLY A LOCAL TRAINING SIMULATION. No public action is needed. MEDIA INQUIRIES: USC Department of Public Safety Chief Carlisle.; - Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0088; 01:59AM; 1219 S Palos Verdes St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3URKHJ3; San Pedro; FIRE NOW OUT: At 1:42AM, the LAFD responded to a reported structure fire. Firefighters found a two story, center hall apartment building with fire showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters initiated an offensive operation and achieved a knockdown in just 17 minutes. Three patients (age/gender/condition unknown) are being evaluated. Cause and $ loss to be determined. No further details. ; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E112 E238 E248 E285 E36 E48 EM11 EM13 EM9 RA101 RA112 RA36 RA38 RA79 RA848 RA85 T38 T48 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1803; 10:55PM; 1118 W 43rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FtHWbq; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 29 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a two story four-plex. The fire was contained to the 2nd floor of two units. Firefighters are working on a thorough search of the first floors (no fire involvement but some smoke) which have excessive storage conditions creating challenges in making entry. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E15 E21 E215 E226 E266 E46 E66 EM11 RA246 RA46 T15 T26 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1803; 10:26PM; 1118 W 43rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FtHWbq; Vermont Square; Two story duplex with heavy fire on the 2nd floor. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E266 E46 E66 RA246 RA46 T15 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle - FATALITY ; INC#1414; 05:50PM; 725 W 92nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UX4EOX; Vermont Vista; At 5:39PM, firefighters responded to a traffic collision with entrapment. Crews located and extracted one patient from under a vehicle who was sadly determined to be beyond medical help. One additional patient is being evaluated for possible hospital transport. (Age/gender of patients not available at this time). Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc # 3245 for the investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E205 E233 E264 E33 E66 EM13 HR3 RA266 RA64 T33 T5 T64 UR5; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0941; 01:45PM; 436 W Vernon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Wdfd1d; Vermont Square; After extricating the patient, approx 30 yo M, he was transported in *at least* serious condition with undetermined injuries. No other injuries reported. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2124 CHP Log# 1309; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E15 E210 E215 E3 E46 EM11 HR3 RA14 RA46 T10 T15 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0941; 01:13PM; 436 W Vernon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Wdfd1d; Vermont Square; One person (male) entrapped in a vehicle (age/condition unknown), reportedly following conclusion of LAPD pursuit. Firefighters are conducting an auto extrication operation. There are no other reported injuries at this time. LAPD Inc# 2124 CHP Log #1309; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E15 E210 E215 E3 E46 EM11 HR3 RA14 RA46 T10 T15 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - with injury; INC#0887; 01:15PM; 10210 N Mountair Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HzC7fk; Tujunga; At 12:44PM the LAFD responded to a reported structure fire. Firefighters located a small fire on the balcony of a three story, garden style apartment building. The resident, 42yo M, reported he was charging an electric scooter which ignited and he moved it to the balcony. He was transported with burn injuries to hands/arms and possible respiratory tract involvement. No further details.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E298 RA74 T74 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#0278; 06:30AM; 400 S Gless St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UOkLOr; Boyle Heights; At 4:38AM, Firefighters responded to a reported auto vs pedestrian and located one person (age/gender unknown at this time) sadly beyond medical help. LAPD responded to handle the death investigation. All questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 0488 and LA County Coroner for determination of death and identification. No further details.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; E202 RA2 T2; CH4; Margaret Stewart
